data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nB4TdslCmEIQ7kNvgF5-MI7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AxMCa-P6ZLBTegnfA0uTpIM&oh=00_AYA8FiqHqtXENkSXZX3h6rgGCjQ_oFs6jdUfC1uz4PBI5w&oe=66F543B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=T3_ROyXp_G0Q7kNvgG0Zfjp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AxMCa-P6ZLBTegnfA0uTpIM&oh=00_AYCeEkYqUADwYnHzne2lsPQgIUgTf72DD8x9pNo6WnhqRA&oe=66F55152)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
